inclusion.criterion: At least two organ systems moderately active to a minimum of BILAG B or SLEDAI score of 6.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Safety or circumstantial reasons why volunteer cannot comply with the protocol.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of systemic mastocytosis, but is otherwise healthy and has responded well to treatment. She does not have any active or major chronic disease.
